targetLine.text: I overslept; look, I need your help. I have to ask Lorraine out, but I don't know how to do it.

contextBefore.text: Hey, George, buddy, you weren't at school, what have you been doinâ€™ all day?

contextAfter.text: Alright, okay listen, keep your pants on, she's over in the cafe. God, how do you do this?
What made you change your mind, George?
Last night, Darth Vader came down from planet Vulcan. And he told me that if I didn't take Lorraine, that he'd melt my brain.

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
